description: This file provides a class 'DiscordTools' that offers methods for interacting with Discord channels and servers, including sending messages, retrieving channel info, listing channels, fetching message history, and deleting messages. It integrates with the Discord API and uses environment variables for configuration.

classes.name: DiscordTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Discord channels and servers via the Discord API.

methods.name: _make_request
methods.description: Internal method to make HTTP requests to the Discord API.

methods.name: send_message
methods.description: Send a message to a specified Discord channel.

methods.name: get_channel_info
methods.description: Retrieve information about a specific Discord channel.

methods.name: list_channels
methods.description: List all channels in a specified Discord server.

methods.name: get_channel_messages
methods.description: Fetch message history from a Discord channel.

methods.name: delete_message
methods.description: Delete a specific message from a Discord channel.

methods.name: get_tool_name
methods.description: Return the name of the tool.

methods.name: get_tool_description
methods.description: Return the description of the tool.

methods.name: get_tool_config
methods.description: Return the configuration requirements for the tool.
